title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5007.6 - Time, place and manner of conducting drawings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5007.6 - Time, place and manner of conducting drawings

State Regulations

For the Mega Millions game: Mega Millions drawings will
be conducted twice weekly approximately 11:00 p.m. eastern time in one of the
party lottery states. The day, time, frequency and location of the Mega

Millions drawings may be changed following public
announcement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5007.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
